question:
In Budget 2018, the Finance Minister announced for starting Ekalavya Model Residential schools in the country. In this context, consider the following statements:
  1. The Ekalavya Model schools aim to provide quality education to children from scheduled castes and scheduled tribes community
  2. This scheme aims to cover every block in the country that has more than 50% ST population and at least 20,000 tribal persons.
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: In an effort to provide quality education to children from SC & ST communities in India, the Finance Minister in Budget 2018 announced to open Ekalavya Model Residential schools in the country. The government aims to cover every block in the country that has 50% ST population and at least 20,000 tribal persons under the scheme by 2022. The facilities that will be provided in the Ekalavya schools will be similar to that of Navodaya Vidyalayas.
